channel.title: Problem with shops in 562
channel.description: alright so i followed this tutorial to the T http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,468514.0.html and somehow something isn't right. i get no errors on compile or anything. So im trying to spawn one of the npc's for the shop that has been premade such as a weapon shop, and to said coords. party pete is the weapons vendor and when i list him in the npcs.xml, he spawns just fine but doesnt open the shop. the files i have edited are shops.java, summonpackethandler, shophandler, and of course npcs.html. am i missing a command for him to open the shop?

item.title: Problem with shops in 562
item.dc:creator: @itzdustin itzdustin
item.description:
@itzdustin wrote:

alright so i followed this tutorial to the T http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,468514.0.html and somehow something isn’t right. i get no errors on compile or anything. So im trying to spawn one of the npc’s for the shop that has been premade such as a weapon shop, and to said coords. party pete is the weapons vendor and when i list him in the npcs.xml, he spawns just fine but doesnt open the shop. the files i have edited are shops.java, summonpackethandler, shophandler, and of course npcs.html. am i missing a command for him to open the shop?
